graphql.query:
mutation ($payload:CommonCreateLangInput!)
{
	commonCreateLang (payload:$payload)
	{
		id
		name
		image
		iso6392
		iso6393
		ietf
		customCode
		dir
		sort
		isActive
	}
}

graphql.query:
query ($query:QueryStatement)
{
	commonGetLangs (query: $query)
	{
		id
		name
		image
		iso6392
		iso6393
		ietf
		customCode
		dir
		sort
		isActive
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}

query ($query:QueryStatement)
{
	commonFindLang (query: $query)
	{
		id
		name
		image
		iso6392
		iso6393
		ietf
		customCode
		dir
		sort
		isActive
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}

query ($id:ID)
{
	commonFindLangById (id:$id)
	{
		id
		name
		image
		iso6392
		iso6393
		ietf
		customCode
		dir
		sort
		isActive
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}

mutation ($payload:CommonUpdateLangInput!)
{
	commonUpdateLang (payload:$payload)
	{
		id
		name
		image
		iso6392
		iso6393
		ietf
		customCode
		dir
		sort
		isActive
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}

mutation ($id:ID!)
{
	commonDeleteLangById (id:$id)
	{
		id
		name
		image
		iso6392
		iso6393
		ietf
		customCode
		dir
		sort
		isActive
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}

mutation ($query:QueryStatement)
{
	commonDeleteLangs (query: $query)
	{
		id
		name
		image
		iso6392
		iso6393
		ietf
		customCode
		dir
		sort
		isActive
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}
